features.featureTitle: Update the landing page hero product photo to use the same user-provided image that was previously added (i.e., revert the current hero image change). Specifically, change the centralized hero image path constant (HERO_IMAGE_SRC in frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts) from the current file to the user-provided image file located in the static assets directory (frontend/public/assets/generated), and ensure the Hero section renders that image without any broken links.
